ruling: - See [[Gladiator Beast Alexander]] for additional rulings.

- If [[Gladiator Beast Secutor]] attacks or is attacked and it is flipped face-down or removed from the field before the end of the Battle Phase, it will not be able to activate its effect to Special Summon 2 "Gladiator Beast" monsters from the Deck, even if it is returned to the field or flipped face-up before the end of the Battle Phase.

- When you activate the effect of [[Gladiator Beast Secutor]] and you have only 1 available Monster Zone Space, you will still choose 2 "Gladiator Beast" monsters. You will choose one of the selected monsters and Special Summon it, and the other is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard.

- If you activate the effect of [[Gladiator Beast Secutor]] and when resolving the effect you only have 1 "Gladiator Beast" monster that you can Special Summon, the effect of [[Gladiator Beast Secutor]] disappears and you will verify with your opponent by briefly revealing your Deck.
